§ 7374. Expert accountant for Inspector General The Secretary of the Army shall appoint an expert accountant to perform duties under the Inspector General. (Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 234, § 4024; renumbered § 7374, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(b)(15), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1839.)
